text: Tippo Bayou is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Opinions are divided whether this creek is named after the Ibitoupa Indian tribe, or a name derived from the Choctaw language meaning "severed, parted, separated". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Leflore County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Tallahatchie County, Mississippi
title: Tippo Bayou
